
```{python, eval=TRUE, results="asis", echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
#target = [

target = [
      "linearQ3-1"

]

```

```{python, eval=TRUE, results="asis", echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

for p in target:
    print(CTNS(
        target = [ p ], 
        image_target = p,
        #write_file = False,
        write_image = False,
        skip_image = True,
        #action="ctns_make",
        opt_ctns = [
          "dynamic",
          "qa",
          "quiz_css='width:100%;'", 
          "no_reference",
          "flush"
        ]))
```
